item.title: Lisk For Investors #12 - Potential Impact Of Charles Hoskinson On Lisk - By Tai Zen & Leon Fu
item.description:
Lisk For Investors #12 - Potential Impact Of Charles Hoskinson On Lisk - By Tai Zen & Leon Fu

In this hangout, Tai Zen & Leon Fu will interview Charles Hoskinson about his new role at Lisk.io. In the hangout we will discuss Charles': -- software and crypto background. -- role at Bitshares. -- role as cofounder of Ethereum -- current project at ihok.io -- current involvement with Lisk.io -- etc.

item.title: Two Early Ethereum Backers Join Lisk as Senior Advisers | Finance Magnates
item.description:
Two Early Ethereum Backers Join Lisk as Senior Advisers | Finance Magnates

A decentralized applications and custom blockchain platform, Lisk has added two American early backers of Ethereum, Charles Hoskinson and Steven Nerayoff, as senior advisers. Lisk CEO Max Kordek announced: "We are extremely pleased to announce Charles Hoskinson and Steven Nerayoff as our senior advisors, which accelerates Lisk product growth by giving valuable input on the technology and startup methodology," said Kordek.

item.title: Re: daoist 道 [SEEDCHAIN BaaS] SMART_FARM_SIDECHAIN - June 4 Update - Lisk Forum
item.description:
Re: daoist 道 [SEEDCHAIN BaaS] SMART_FARM_SIDECHAIN - June 4 Update - Lisk Forum

"The 3rd annual Indoor Agriculture Conference in Las Vegas, Nevada showcased a number of gaps and opportunities related to investor relations between AgTech startups and VCs. A whitepaper released during the conference, the first of its kind, offered a comprehensive view to the future and potential $9 billion growth of indoor farming.

item.title: LSK: Something is Brewing - LSKBTC TradingView
item.description:
LSK: Something is Brewing - LSKBTC TradingView

Is Lisk drawing a cup & handle pattern? I am expecting LSK to break the 82k barrier soon. Waiting for resistance to become support before re-entering. Holding previous long positions from 60-70K. What do you think?

item.title: Winklevoss Twins' Gemini Exchange Starts International Expansion
item.description:
Winklevoss Twins' Gemini Exchange Starts International Expansion

Gemini Trust Co., the U.S.-based digital-currency exchange founded by entrepreneurs Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, took a step Monday toward its goal of global expansion by starting to serve Canadian customers. Within days, Gemini will also introduce service in another foreign country, Chief Executive Officer Tyler Winklevoss said in an interview.

item.title: LSK BULL: WEEK 2
item.description:
LSK BULL: WEEK 2

"Last week LSK listed on with an extraordinary opening day in terms of volume and price action. Its I.C.O. price was 0.00018265 LSK/XBT and immediately listed at 0.00275 LSK/XBT on Poloniex (1400% return), the price dumped to a low of 0.00035 and is now trading around 0.00070.
